unalcol.reflect.compiler

Class Compiler

  • java.lang.Object
    • unalcol.reflect.compiler.Compiler

  • public class Compiler
extends java.lang.Object
    Compiler

    A basic Java Compiler.

    Source code is available.

      • run

        public boolean run(java.lang.String javaFile)
        Spawns a process to compile the java source code file specified in the 'javaFile' parameter.
        Parameters:
        javaFile - Java file to be compiled
        Returns:
        true if the compilation succeeds, false otherwise.

      • clear

        public void clear()
        Resets the destination, class and source paths of the compiler
